Name: Comfort
description:
Meet 41-year-old Comfort from Liberia! She lives with her partner and three children. The children are all in school. Comfort is a high school graduate. She runs a business selling drinks. Ten years ago, she started managing her sales. She started the business with her savings. She works six days a week and uses a car to transport supplies to her business site.

Comfort applied for a loan through BRAC Liberia, a Kiva lending partner. With this loan, she will buy more drinks to sell to her clients. She would like to have an international business in the future.

She wishes to thank all the lenders.
